This is for degens who like to be at the frontier of DeFi and want to support debt markets for DAO's.

articles.description:
Re These kind of loans obviously come with significant risks.
Revenues of DAO's are highly volatile & can dry up completely.
To mitigate risks somewhat, the bonds are over-collateralized in governance tokens (in this case 250% LTV in $FOX).
